contacts.heroTitle: We want to be part of your story!

ad.title: Advertising
ad.description: Advertising signs are essential to increase a business’s visibility. They can be illuminated or non-illuminated, for indoor or outdoor use, helping capture the attention of passersby and strengthening the brand image even from a distance.
ad.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
ad.ctaText: We design and manufacture custom LED-lit signs, letters, totems, and weather-resistant advertising panels. We guide you through the whole process, from materials to installation.

vehicles.title: Vehicle Customization
vehicles.description: Vehicle customization is a powerful mobile advertising tool: turning cars, vans, and fleets into communication media increases brand visibility on every trip.
vehicles.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
vehicles.ctaText: We provide full or partial wrapping, adhesive and magnetic applications, and lettering for any vehicle type — with durable materials and professional installation.

gifts.title: Personalized Gifts
gifts.description: Personalized gifts are an effective way to strengthen your brand identity. Pens, mugs, notebooks or tech gadgets — with your logo they become everyday items that communicate for a long time.
gifts.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
gifts.ctaText: We help you choose the most suitable gadgets, finalize the artwork, and manage production end-to-end, ensuring high-quality items that leave a professional impression.

interior.title: Interior Decoration
interior.description: Interior decoration with custom graphics enhances shops, offices, and showrooms. Glass, walls, and surfaces become design and communication tools that elevate the visual experience.
interior.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
interior.ctaText: We create window decals, wall coverings, decorative panels, and tailored solutions to build welcoming, functional spaces that reflect your brand.

laser.title: Laser Cutting & Engraving
laser.description: Laser cutting and engraving precisely customize many materials — wood, acrylic, leather, and metal — delivering fine detail and clean finishes for both industrial runs and unique pieces.
laser.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
laser.ctaText: We produce custom engravings for plaques, gadgets, signage, and promo items, and custom cuts for prototypes, décor, and accessories — from design to delivery.

logos.title: Logo Creation
logos.description: A good logo is the heart of a brand’s visual identity. Beyond aesthetics, it must communicate values, personality, and recognizability across all touchpoints — from business cards to digital ads.
logos.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
logos.ctaText: We craft original, versatile logos, refresh existing brands, and define style guidelines to keep your visual communication consistent.

neon.title: Works with LED Neon
neon.description: LED neon signs and décor add modernity and visibility to shops, events, and interiors, creating a striking atmosphere day and night.
neon.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
neon.ctaText: We design custom, durable, and efficient LED neon signs and shapes — perfect to stand out and decorate with style.

others.title: Other Work
others.description: Special projects that don’t fit a single category: creative installations and custom requests.
others.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
others.ctaText: We craft tailored solutions combining design, print, and innovative materials to turn ideas into reality.

plates.title: Plates and Tarps
plates.description: Rigid panels and PVC/fabric banners are versatile indoor/outdoor solutions — great for temporary promotions or permanent communications.
plates.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
plates.ctaText: We print and produce signs, boards, banners, and tarps using durable, weather-resistant materials.

relief.title: Relief Works
relief.description: Embossed logos and letters add three-dimensionality and visual impact, enhancing indoor and outdoor spaces.
relief.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
relief.ctaText: We create custom 3D relief elements (PVC, acrylic, metal) for signage, walls, and décor.

stand.title: Stands & Displays
stand.description: Essential for fairs, events, and retail: they present products and services clearly and professionally.
stand.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
stand.ctaText: We design and manufacture roll-ups, promo counters, backdrop walls, and modular custom solutions that are easy to assemble and transport.

stationery.title: Stationery
stationery.description: Custom stationery is a key part of visual identity. Business cards, letterhead, envelopes, and notepads convey professionalism and consistency.
stationery.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
stationery.ctaText: We create coordinated sets (letterhead, envelopes, cards, etc.), handling design and print to ensure quality in every detail.

uniforms.title: Uniforms & PPE
uniforms.description: Customized workwear and personal protective equipment convey professionalism and consistency while ensuring comfort and safety.
uniforms.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
uniforms.ctaText: We supply uniforms, jackets, t-shirts, and PPE with printed or embroidered company logos, ensuring fabric quality and functionality.

window.title: Window Display Decoration
window.description: Window stickers, one-way vision (micro-perforated) and cut vinyl: professional design, print, and application. Boost your store’s visibility and communicate offers, opening hours, and branding with durable, compliant solutions.
window.ctaTitle: What we can do for you
window.ctaText: We design your custom storefront — from graphics to installation.
